page.title: 08JOBS
page.content: Unemployment is quite common in our country at this time. Many people work in different towns and villages from the ones they live in.Both men and women go out to work but jobs are difficult to find.In Northend there aren't many jobs.Most jobs are invol_ ved with working on the land,so many people in the village work in the surrounding towns such as Leamington, Warwick, Stratford and Banbury. In a sample of 24 children we found that 66% of their mothers worked.25% of their fathers worked in the villages of Northend,Gaydon or Knightcote. 75% of their fathers worked outside this area.
